title: [K-12] Competency-Based eLearning Design Course for Strengthening Public Health Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Public Health Theory and Basic Instructional Design Principles
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for pre-service/in-service teachers to develop e-learning design competencies in public health. Learners collaborate and develop projects using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners will systematically design e-learning content with specified competencies following the ADDIE model.
Learners will develop project-based assessment tools that reflect public health issues.
Learners will measure e-learning effectiveness based on Kirkpatrick Model Levels 1â€“2.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
